column2: The Fifth Nation kept slaves to ensure its own people would always be free from the burdens of the world.
Legalizing slavery is one of the first steps to restoring the Fifth Nation.
The time has come to shatter the taboo of slavery! Lead the way, and other Remnants of the Fifth Nation will follow!
Slavery will be reinstated, allowing the legalization of Slavery among pirate governments.
Any pirate governor under your control can be made to adopt the Slavery law, so long as you have it yourself.
[Root.GetFirstName] will adopt the Legal Slavery law.
Storm the gates and pillage the city! Once we've ransacked all the valuables, we'll establish a new governor loyal to us!
